def.dt: :to occur by chance often used with it it so happens I'm going your way
:to come into being or occur as an event, process, or result mistakes will happen
:to do, encounter, or attain something by or as if by chance I happen to know the answer
:to meet or discover something by chance happened upon a system that worked Richard Corbin
:to come or go casually :make a chance appearance he might happen by at any time
:to come especially by way of injury or harm I promise nothing will happen to you
